Name: Circularity
About the game: Have you ever wished to play an outstanding puzzle game with unique gameplay and is full of different obstacles ? It's Circularity - Minimalistic Adventure! Game Mechanics: Bring your character to the final portal which will transit you to the next level. However, you will need to move straight, avoid obstacles, jump through portals, ricochet from walls and a lot more. The cleaner your shot and the more stars you will take will unlock more levels. Challenging gameplay. 60+ Challenging Levels Lot of achievements (usable for Steam profile showcase)
